subject: Re: Reminder: Order #SSN4449, how did it go?
description_text:
Hello,


I selected and paid for express shipping (5–7 days) for my order.


According to the tracking information, the shipment remained in China for several days and only departed the origin much later. As a result, the actual delivery time clearly exceeds the advertised 5–7 days, which does not match the express service I paid for.


I kindly ask for a refund of the shipping price difference or an appropriate compensation.


Thank you for your support.

Best regards

Nils

Am 29.12.2025 um 12:48 schrieb SIMSONN <no-reply@loox.io>:

﻿
Hello Nils, We would be grateful if you shared how things look and feel. Your review helps us and the community that supports us, and it only takes a few seconds. ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌
Hello Nils,

We would be grateful if you shared how things look and feel. Your review helps us and the community that supports us, and it only takes a few seconds.

conversations.body_text: Hi Nils Rohe,     I see that the tracking information shows the package has been delivered. Have you received both the pedals and the VAM Pro motors?
